--- grant_on_view_fqn.sql
GRANT SELECT ON VIEW s.v TO ROLE r

--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnView{
    Select: 6,
    Names:  []*ast.Path{
      &ast.Path{
        Idents: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 21,
            NameEnd: 22,
            Name:    "s",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 23,
            NameEnd: 24,
            Name:    "v",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 33,
      NameEnd: 34,
      Name:    "r",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT SELECT ON VIEW s.v TO ROLE r
